Step 3: Test the Theory to Determine Cause
.
Common steps to determine cause for laptop problems
  • Use AC adapter with laptop
  • Replace battery
  • Reboot the laptop
  • Check BIOS settings
  • Disconnect and reconnect the cables
  • Disconnect peripherals
  • Toggle Num Lock key
  • Remove and reinstall RAM
  • Caps lock key is on
  • Check for non-bootable media in a boot device
Common steps to determine cause for mobile device problems
  • Restart the mobile device.
  • Plug the mobile device into an AC outlet
  • Replace the mobile device battery
  • Remove any removable battery and reinstall it
  • Clean the speaker, microphone, charging port, or other connection ports
